text:
Both my children attended Arise. A very warm and closely knitted environment for them to grow and learn with loving and dedicated teachers and staff too, who are very responsive and helpful. The children love going to school and still have fond memories of the time spent.
Indeed, it takes a village to raise a child and we are glad that we are a part of this village.

A nature-conducive and enriched environment coupled with fun loving and committed staffs/teachers. My three kids are attending or attended Arise Preschool are always looking forward to school days to meet their friends and teachers or revisit their teachers whenever they can!
The teachers from Arise Preschool are amazing. They are nurturing and loving to the kids, treating them like their own. Thank you for planting the seeds of love, knowledge and wisdom to our kids.
Dedicated, caring and friendly working staff and Teachers. All my 3 kids (2 graduated from kinder) had fond memories of their time in Arise Preschool.
Love the environment. Arise has wonderful and dedicated teachers. My daughter loves the school so much.
